name: Preschool
description: Cypress School is based on play, inquiry, exploration, developing relationships, and love of learning according to the natural patterns of the individual child within the context of group learning experiences. - Circle Time - Activities, Small Group or Committee Work, Jobs, and Walks - Creative Art Activities - Snack, Handwashing, and Toileting - Movement / Outside Play
fullDescription: Cypress School is based on play, inquiry, exploration, developing relationships, and love of learning according to the natural patterns of the individual child within the context of group learning experiences. - Circle Time - Activities, Small Group or Committee Work, Jobs, and Walks - Creative Art Activities - Snack, Handwashing, and Toileting - Movement / Outside Play
whatTheyOffer: Cypress School is based on play, inquiry, exploration, developing relationships, and love of learning according to the natural patterns of the individual child within the context of group learning experiences. - Circle Time - Activities, Small Group or Committee Work, Jobs, and Walks - Creative Art Activities - Snack, Handwashing, and Toileting - Movement / Outside Play
howToGetIt: To start the application process, request a tour between October and January. It is recommend touring the year prior to entering. For more information and to say informed of events, register on Ravenna Hub and click "explore" for Cypress School. Once you have learned more about Cypress School, you may complete an Online Application via Ravenna Hub for each child and submit your application processing fee. (please email admissions@cypressschoolsf.org for the application fee waiver code) You may schedule your mandatory 30-minute Parent/Guardian Chat via Zoom or in person after you have completed your application.
cost: This is a fee based service. Sliding scale is available with proof of income requirements.
